120953.「私は 転職をつかさどる ダーマの神殿\n ……の元柱だった身。職業を変えたいな:
I am the former pillar of Alltrades Abbey... in charge of changing vocations. If you want to change your vocation, I can help you.
However, in the tower, your level will be transferred to your new vocation, and your skills will be reset. Be careful. Now...
What would you like to do? Change Vocation Explanation

120954.「ここは 転職をつかさどる\n ダーマの神殿 出張所。\n 職業を変えたい者が:
This is the Alltrades Abbey, the seat of the
changeling... Those who wish to change
professions, come...<bw_break>

120955.「そういえば モンスター牧場に\n 空きがあるようだが 連れていた\n <%sM:
Oh, by the way, there's a vacancy at the
monster farm, should I send the <%sM_monster>
you had with you?<yesno><break>

120956.「おや？ レベル<%nM_maxlv>に 到達しているぞ。\n 送っても これ以:
Hmm? I've reached my maximum level... If I
send you back, you won't get any more
experience, is that okay?<yesno><break>

120957.「……む？\n モンスター牧場で 受け取れる経験値が\n あるようだな。\n<b:
... No? There's experience to be received at the monster farm... In order to send them to the monster farm, you need to receive the
experience first... The <%sM_monster> you're carrying will be held at the Monster Tavern, so you'll have to go through the process
again after you've earned the experience...

120958.<color_yellow>つれている <%sM_monster>は\nモンスタ:
<color_yellow>My <%sM_monster> has been sent to the monster
farm!

120959.「何を 希望されるかな？\n<select_se_off>\n転職する\n説明を:
What would you like?
<select_se_off>
I'm changing jobs
Listen to the explanation
<select_end>
<break>

120960.「よし。今から お前は <%sM_new_syokugyou>として\n 生きて:
Good. From here on, you will go forth as a <%sM_new_syokugyou>. First, you will learn this new ability.
<%sM_self> learned Scout Attack!
This is an essential skill that you will need when trying to scout monsters. Make sure to use it on a monster you want to join you.
If you win the battle after using it, the monster may wish to join you. Scout Attack also doesn't need to deal the finishing blow.

120961.「ただし スカウトアタックを使うためには\n 仲間にしたいモンスターの名前が付い:
However, before you can use Scout Attack, you must first read a scouting book, which has the name of the monster you desire.
After reading it, you will be able to use Scout Attack against it.
Scouting books can be bought in the basement of any tavern.

120962.「もっと くわしい話は 酒場の地下にある\n モンスター酒場で聞けるぞ。\n 何:
You can get more detailed information at the Monster Bar in the basement of the tavern. If you need any help, just ask there. And
remember to read the Scout's Book. And don't forget to review your equipment. Let's go.

120963.「モンスターを仲間にする際には\n 先ほど覚えた スカウトアタックという\n <:
In order to join a monster, you need to use a special <%sM_new_syokugyou> move called Scout Attack. If you win the battle after using the
scout attack, the monster will wake up and join you... You don't have to finish him off with that move...

120964.「私からの説明は 以上だが\n もう一度 聞くかね？\n<yesno><clos:
That's all I have to say on the matter. Do
you want to hear it again?<yesno><close>

120965.<color_yellow>つれている <%sM_monster>は\nモンスタ:
<color_yellow>My <%sM_monster> has been sent to the Monster
Tavern!

120967.「よし。今から お前は <%sM_new_syokugyou>として\n 生きて:
Good. From now on, you will live as <%sM_new_syokugyou>. The first thing you need to do is wake up to a new ability...
<%sM_self> has learned the Scout Attack feat!
Scouting attacks are similar for Monster Masters and Item Masters, but they target different monsters.
You'll need to read the Scout Book for your vocation before you can take them on. Scout books can be purchased in the basement of any
tavern. You'll have a new vocation with different equipment. Don't forget to review it. Let's go.

120968.「この中では 外とは違い 呪文や特技を\n 別の職業に 引き継ぐことは出来ない。:
In here, unlike out there, you can't transfer spells or skills from one profession to another... When you change jobs, your skill
points will be reset... So you can reassign your skill points to your new job...

120969.「何について 知りたいのだ？\n<select_se_off>\n魔塔内での転職:
What do you want to know about?
<select_se_off>
Changing Jobs in the Magic Tower
About Skill Points
<select_end>
<break>

120970.「スキルポイントは 本来 レベル２以上から\n 授かるものだが この塔の中にはい:
Skill points are normally awarded at level 2 and above, but as soon as you enter this tower, you'll receive 100 points... The first
thing you should do when you enter the tower is to use your skill points to strengthen yourself... You can also raise or lower your
skill points at any time in this tower... You can reassign them as the situation demands...

120971.「転職とは もちろん 職業を変えることだが\n ここでの転職は 少し特殊だ。\n:
A career change is, of course, a change of occupation, but a career change here is a bit... There are some differences between
here and outside the tower, so listen up... When you change jobs in the tower, your level is transferred to your new job, and your
skill points from your old job are reset. Be careful not to forget to transfer your skill points... Make sure you do before going to
the next level...

120972.「どの職業に なりたいのかね？\n<break>: What career do you want to pursue?<break>

120973.「ならば どの職業に なりたいのだ？\n<break>: Then what career would you like to pursue?<break>

120974.「では <%sM_self>よ。<%sM_new_syokugyou>の\n 気:
Oh <%sM_self>. Let us pray in the spirit of
<%sM_new_syokugyou>. Oh Allmighty Alltrades. Give
<%sM_self> a new life!
<bw_break>

120975.「……む？ お前は すでに\n <%sM_syokugyou>の職に ついている:
... No? You're already working for
<%sM_syokugyou>. Which one do you want to be?<break>

120976.「……ふむ。\n <%sM_new_syokugyou>に 転職するのだな？\n:
..... You're changing jobs to
<%sM_new_syokugyou>, aren't you?<yesno><close>

120977.「よし。今から お前は <%sM_new_syokugyou>として\n 生きて:
Good. From now on, you will live as
<%sM_new_syokugyou>... Do not fail to review
your equipment and skills...

120978.「よし。今から お前は <%sM_new_syokugyou>として\n 生きて:
Good. From now on, you will live as
<%sM_new_syokugyou>... You're in training
mode now... Let's go...

120979.「よし。今から お前は <%sM_new_syokugyou>として\n 生きて:
Good. From now on, you will live as
<%sM_new_syokugyou>... Do not fail to review
your equipment and skills...

120980.「転職しないのだな。それも よいだろう。\n さあ 行くがよい。<end>:
I'm not changing jobs. That's good... Let's
go...<end>

120981.「おや？\n <%sM_monster>は 死んでいるようだな。\n このまま送:
Oh? It seems that your <%sM_monster> is not with us. How awful to just leave them like that.
If you wish to change paths, you must revive them before doing so.

120982.「おや？ お前は\n いまわしい呪いに おかされているな。\n<br>\n「転職:
Hmm? You're under a terrible curse. You'd
better go to the church to get rid of the
curse before you change jobs...

122636.「……む？\n お前は 転職を行うための\n ダーマの試練を 終えていないようだ:
... No? You haven't completed the Abbey Trials to change vocations. You can't change vocations until you completer the trials. You
will be tested at the Alltrades Abbey outside the tower.

123150.<color_yellow>スキルポイントが リセットされました。\n次の階へ:
<color_yellow>My skill points are reset... I'll have to
reallocate my skill points before going to
the next floor...
